activity.documentation: CRRM is a process for defining testable, measurable system requirements for cyber resilience using MBSE techniques. Each step of CRRM refines the artifacts of the MBSE model while the key artifacts of each step of CRRM are show as input / output flows.
activity.qualifiedName: Process::Perform Cyber Resilience Requirements Methodology (CRRM)::Perform Cyber Resilience Requirements Methodology (CRRM)

controlflow.name: Control Flow[:Setup SCRE Environment -> :Define System Description]
Control Flow[:Define System Description -> :Perform Hazard Analysis]
Control Flow[:Perform Hazard Analysis -> :Perform Loss Scenario Asssessment]
Control Flow[:Perform Loss Scenario Asssessment -> :Define Resilience Architecture]
Control Flow[:Define Resilience Architecture -> :Perform Verification & Test Assessment]
Control Flow[:Define Resilience Architecture -> Sufficient Resilience?]

objectflow.name: Object Flow[Resilient System Description -> Acceptable Plan?]
Object Flow[Acceptable Plan? -> Resilient System Definition]
Object Flow[Cyber Security Expertise -> Cyber Security Expertise]
Object Flow[Test Strategy Expertise -> Test Strategy Expertise]
